Articles.Content:
I'm having a weird issue where some of my ships change their staging as soon as they load on the launch pad. Occasionally rebuilding the ship fixes the problem but that doesn't always help. Is there a quick fix anyone knows about, searching around I couldn't find any information?

Thanks!
I've never seen that, but it sounds like a support issue. And so, moved to Support. How about some screenshots in VAB and on pad? Any mods installed?

While you say "some of your ships", meaning that it's not one ship in particular, double check your design.   Mouse over the staging icons in the VAB, and confirm the part that get's highlighted is the part you intend to stage there.    Then go to the launch pad and do the same, confirm things are either where you left, or have moved.   While most staging or fuel flow bugs are design errors, it could be a weird bug you got.

Check your staging in the vab.

Or just make sure you save and launch directly from the vab.
